header_text: You are in a meeting, and during a brief break, you call home to speak to your significant other. You are late getting back into the meeting room, so everyone looks up when you open the door. Others see your actions as disruptive.

elements.text: You are in a meeting, and during a brief break, you call home to speak to your significant other. You are late getting back into the meeting room, so everyone looks up when you open the door. Others see your actions as disruptive.
